name: XTOPOLY - Out of Business
description:
XTOPOLY is a full service, award-winning mobile interactive agency. 
Our POV is 'strategy over tactic' and before taking on a project we take time to understand business goals, objectives and then recommend (then build!) solutions to help meet those business goals. We work side-by-side with our Clients and are available to support long after the project is completed. 
Our strategy, ideation, creative, technology and account services teams are all in-house. We have 2 offices, HQ in Orange County and San Francisco.
